SubHeaders.Title: Psychosis Defined
SubHeaders.InfoDump: Started as a hobby project during the 2020 pandemic to learn Vulkan and to improve my C++, WinApi, and Mathematic skills. The game is a top-down 2D rougelite, borrowing elements from building games like Terraria and Minecraft and rougelike elements from games like Shopkeeper and Risk Of Rain. game loop is to delve, fight new enemies, craft unique items, upgrade and customize your home base.

SubHeaders.Title: Assorted Python
SubHeaders.InfoDump: Quick applications made using Python. Ranging from testing out some ideas before implementing them in a larger project to handy tools I made to help me with other projects.
